name: AeroMaster
description: This driver knows their car's aerodynamics better than anyone else. They gain a +10% to the car's Chassis Performance.

name: Aggressive
description: This driver likes to take a more aggressive approach. They receive a bonus when overtaking.

name: BusinessMinded
description: This driver has a great mind for business. Their team qualifies for the next-highest sponsor tier (does not stack).

name: Careful
description: This driver knows their limits and applies them efficiently. They are less likely to crash.

name: DefensiveDriver
description: This driver knows how to stand their ground. They are less likely to be overtaken.

name: Duellist
description: This driver never backs down from a challenge. They gain a +1 to all stats when there is one or more drivers near them.

name: EatMyDust
description: This driver gives their best when victory is near. They receive a +1 to all stats while in 1st place.

name: EfficientDriver
description: This driver knows how to make the best out of their fuel. They consume fuel 5% slower.

name: FlashInThePan
description: This driver isn't here for the long run. They have a higher chance of advancing career stages.

name: Handy
description: This driver knows a thing or two about cars. They gain a bonus to car reliability.

name: Hooner
description: This driver doesn't seem to acknowledge their tire's conditions. Their tires wear 5% faster.

name: InefficientDriver
description: This driver does not pay enough attention to the fuel meter. They consume fuel 5% faster.

name: Jealous
description: This driver does not take competition well. They receive a -1 to all stats if your other driver's car has a higher performance stat.

name: Jerk
description: This driver's manners aren't as good as their driving. They receive a -1 to engineer precision.

name: Meditator
description: This driver's focus is remarkable. They have a higher chance of increasing Focus but a lower chance of increasing Speed.

name: MonacoNose
description: This driver just loves the air of France. They receive a +2 to all stats at Circuit de Casino.

name: NaturalStar
description: This driver has a knack for fame. They receive a +1 to bonus resources earned per race.

name: Passive
description: This driver likes to take things slow. They receive a penalty when overtaking.

name: Patriotic
description: This driver works best when they do it for their country. They gain a +1 to Focus when racing on a track in their country of origin.

name: Personable
description: This driver is a pleasure to be around. They gain a +1 to engineer precision.

name: Picky
description: This driver seems to find issues with almost every car. They are more likely to complain about their car on the radio.

name: Privateer
description: This driver is surprisingly affordable. They cost 5 resources cheaper than normal.

name: Prodigy
description: This driver shows great potential. They have a higher chance of gaining skill and focus in their Early Career but a lower chance in their other Career stages.

name: QualiIssues
description: This driver doesn't take qualis as seriously as they should. They have a -2 to their focus during qualifying.

name: QualiMaster
description: This driver takes qualis very seriously. They have a +2 to their focus during qualifying.

name: Rainmeister
description: This driver knows how to navigate wet tracks efficiently. They have a lower chance of crashing when it rains.

name: Reckless
description: This driver enjoys the adrenaline a bit too much. They are more likely to crash.

name: RichParents
description: This driver costs 0 to hire. They really don't need the money.

name: Silkworm
description: This driver knows how to use their tires efficiently. Their tires wear 5% slower.

name: SpeedFreak
description: This driver lives for the thrill of high speeds. They have a higher chance of increasing Speed but a lower chance of increasing Focus.

name: StayingPower
description: This driver's skills age like fine wine. They have a lower chance of advancing career stages.

name: TechnicallyInept
description: This driver knows their way around a pedal, but not so much around an engine. Their cars have less reliability.

name: TestDriver
description: This driver knows their way around most types of cars. They gain a +10% to the car's overall reliability.

name: Unshakeable
description: This driver gives their best when things are looking dire. They receive a +1 to all stats while lower than 10th place.

name: WeakDefense
description: This driver's defense game has some evident flaws. They are more likely to be overtaken.
